name: Shri Ram
special_ability: Brahmastra Strike - Deals massive damage to any enemy
description: The prince of Ayodhya, the embodiment of dharma and righteousness.

name: Hanuman
special_ability: Sanjeevani - Restores health to a chosen ally
description: The mighty devotee of Lord Ram, known for his strength and devotion.

name: Krishna
special_ability: Sudharshan Chakra - Bypasses enemy defenses
description: The divine strategist and guide of the Pandavas, master of dharma.

name: Bheema
special_ability: Gada Smash - Deals extra damage
description: The strongest of the Pandavas, known for his immense power.

name: Bhishma Pitamah
special_ability: Iccha Mrityu - Can survive one fatal blow
description: The great grandsire of the Kuru dynasty, bound by his vow.

name: Guru Dronacharya
special_ability: Brahma Astra - Reduces enemy attack for 2 turns
description: The great teacher of Kauravas and Pandavas, master of warfare.

name: Karna
special_ability: Kavach-Kundal - Reduces first incoming damage
description: The son of the Sun God, a warrior of unparalleled skill.

name: Duryodhana
special_ability: Mace Duel - Deals increased damage to Pandavas
description: The eldest of the Kauravas, filled with ambition and pride.

name: Parashurama
special_ability: Axe of Justice - Instantly defeats a non-divine warrior
description: The warrior-sage who wiped out corrupt rulers.

name: Indra
special_ability: Vajra Strike - Stuns an enemy for one turn
description: The king of the gods, wielder of the thunderbolt.

name: Arjuna
special_ability: Pashupatastra - Deals massive damage to all enemies
description: The finest archer of the Pandavas, guided by Lord Krishna.

name: Yudhishthira
special_ability: Truth Incarnate - Cannot be affected by mind-control abilities
description: The eldest Pandava, known for his wisdom and righteousness.

name: Narakasura
special_ability: Demonic Surge - Gains attack power for every defeated ally
description: A fearsome demon king, ultimately slain by Lord Krishna.

name: Meghnad (Indrajit)
special_ability: Nagpash - Binds an enemy for 2 turns
description: Son of Ravana, the only warrior to defeat Indra in battle.

name: Ravana
special_ability: Ten Heads - Can take multiple attacks before falling
description: The ten-headed king of Lanka, a great scholar and warrior.

name: Vibhishana
special_ability: Divine Vision - Reveals an enemy’s weakness
description: The righteous brother of Ravana, who allied with Shri Ram.

name: Ghatotkacha
special_ability: Sky Wrath - Deals extra damage when played at night
description: The half-demon son of Bheema, known for his aerial battles.

name: Shakuni
special_ability: Devious Tactics - Can manipulate opponent’s energy
description: The cunning mastermind behind the Kauravas’ schemes.

name: Lakshmana
special_ability: Rage Strike - Deals extra damage when Ram is in play
description: The devoted brother of Shri Ram, known for his fierce loyalty.

name: Surya Deva
special_ability: Solar Blessing - Restores health to all allies
description: The Sun God, father of Karna, radiating divine energy.

name: Dronacharya
special_ability: Guru's Command - Increases attack power of allied warriors
description: The legendary teacher of the Kauravas and Pandavas.

name: Bharata
special_ability: Righteous Heart - Reduces energy cost of Ram-related cards
description: The noble brother of Shri Ram, who ruled in his absence.

name: Kuber
special_ability: Wealth Incarnate - Grants bonus energy to allies
description: The god of wealth and ruler of Lanka before Ravana.

name: Karna
special_ability: Kavach Kundal - Immune to first two attacks
description: The tragic hero, blessed by Surya but fated for misfortune.

name: Shiva
special_ability: Shiv Tandav - Instantly defeats a random enemy card
description: The destroyer and transformer, supreme among the gods.

name: Indra
special_ability: Vajra Strike - Deals massive lightning damage
description: The king of the heavens and wielder of the Vajra.

name: Brahma
special_ability: Creation Blessing - Revives a fallen ally
description: The creator of the universe, bestower of wisdom.

name: Ashwatthama
special_ability: Eternal Curse - Cannot be permanently defeated
description: The immortal warrior cursed to wander forever.

name: Vasuki
special_ability: Poison Breath - Weakens all enemies
description: The great serpent used in the churning of the ocean.

name: Vibhishana
special_ability: Righteous Betrayal - Weakens all enemy demon cards
description: The noble demon who allied with Shri Ram against Ravana.

name: Surya
special_ability: Solar Blessing - Heals all allied characters
description: The Sun God, father of Karna and the source of all energy.

name: Varuna
special_ability: Tidal Wave - Reduces enemy attack power
description: The god of oceans and celestial justice.

name: Agni
special_ability: Flame Purge - Deals continuous burn damage
description: The god of fire and sacrifice, a celestial purifier.

name: Rishi Vishwamitra
special_ability: Divine Boon - Grants an extra turn
description: The great sage who trained Shri Ram in divine warfare.

name: Narada
special_ability: Celestial Messenger - Allows peeking at opponent's cards
description: The traveling sage, spreading divine wisdom and mischief.

name: Yama
special_ability: Judgment Call - Instantly removes an enemy with low health
description: The god of death and dharma, judge of mortal souls.

name: Shukracharya
special_ability: Sanjeevani - Revives an allied demon character
description: The mentor of Asuras, master of resurrection and strategy.

name: Banasura
special_ability: A Thousand Arms - Attacks twice per turn
description: The mighty demon king, granted a boon by Shiva himself.

name: Meghnad
special_ability: Indrajit - Can turn invisible for one turn
description: The son of Ravana, master of celestial weaponry.

name: Parshuram
special_ability: Axe of Destruction - Deals heavy damage to all Kshatriya opponents
description: The immortal warrior-sage, avatar of Vishnu, and destroyer of corrupt Kshatriyas.

name: Jayadratha
special_ability: Gatekeeper's Vow - Blocks enemy attacks for one turn
description: The ruler of Sindhu, responsible for Abhimanyu’s tragic fate in battle.

name: Satyaki
special_ability: Loyal Ally - Gains extra attack power when Krishna is in play
description: A fearless warrior and a staunch supporter of the Pandavas.

name: Draupadi
special_ability: Oath of Vengeance - Increases attack power of all allied Pandavas
description: The fire-born queen, wife of the Pandavas, whose humiliation sparked the great war.

name: Kumbhakarna
special_ability: Titan's Slumber - Immune to damage for one turn but sleeps after attacking
description: The mighty brother of Ravana, known for his unparalleled strength and deep slumber.

name: Ghatotkacha
special_ability: Nightfall Fury - Gains double attack power at night
description: The mighty Rakshasa warrior, son of Bhima, who fought valiantly against Karna.

name: Mandodari
special_ability: Wise Counsel - Reduces energy cost of allied demon cards
description: The noble and wise queen of Lanka, wife of Ravana, and a voice of reason.

name: Shakuni
special_ability: Master Manipulator - Forces opponent to discard a random card
description: The cunning prince of Gandhara, mastermind behind the Pandavas' downfall.

name: Barbarika
special_ability: Three Arrows - Can eliminate any opponent in three turns
description: The warrior with divine arrows, bound by a vow to fight for the weaker side.

name: Indra
special_ability: Vajra Strike - Deals massive damage to enemy gods and demons
description: The king of the gods, wielder of the mighty Vajra, and ruler of Svarga.
